relation: Ancillary Services relating to Security/Facility Management Systems
Installation of Security/Facility Management Systems Requiring Construction.
pageTitle: Total Solutions for Law Enforcement, Security, Facilities Management, Fire, Rescue, Clothing, Marine Craft and Emergency/Disaster Response - Schedule 84
textBeforeTable: Security System Management, Design & Support Services, Marine Craft & Waterfront Security Products & Services Schedule 84 Security Solutions - GSA can provide complete security solutions to meet your agency needs. This integration of physical, personal, and data security systems can be accomplished through new and innovative solutions utilizing existing tools, including GSA Multiple Award Schedules (MAS). 1122 Counterdrug Program - Developed through Section 1122 of the Fiscal Year 1994 National Defense Authorization Act, establishing the authority for state and local governments to purchase law enforcement equipment through federal procurement channels, provided the equipment is used in the performance of counterdrug activities. GSA Schedule 70 - General Purpose Commercial Information Technology Equipment, Software and Services. GSA Schedule 84 - Total Solutions for Law Enforcement, Security, Facility Management Systems, Fire, Rescue, Special Purpose Clothing, Marine Craft, and Emergency/Disaster Response; and Cooperative Purchasing Program - Under this program, state and local government entities may purchase equipment and related services from contracts awarded under the following two Schedules: Additional Security Related Programs from GSA Special Purpose Clothing. Marine Craft & Equipment; and Law Enforcement & Security Equipment Supplies & Services; Firefighting & Rescue Equipment – Urban & Wildland; Alarm & Signal Systems, Facility Management Services, Professional Security/Facility Management Services & Guard Services – For Other Types of Facilities; Alarm & Signal Systems, Facility Management Services,
